title: Chocolate and Hazelnut Meringue Cake
ingredients: ['6 egg whites', '175g caster sugar', '100g icing sugar, sieved', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '100g hazelnuts, lightly-roasted, de-skinned, cooled, processed in a food processor to fine/coarse crumbs', '115g plain chocolate, chopped', '300ml whipping cream', '1 tablespoon icing sugar, sieved', '1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder']
